definition: aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale

pinyin: he2 dong4 li4 hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4

definition: carrier-based vanguard group (CBVG)/naval battle group led by an aircraft carrier
pinyin: hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4 zhan4 dou4 qun2

sentences.english: It is a training center, like a carrier, for chain stores for iron art forging.
sentences.chinese: 是符合我国国情的铁艺锻打加盟培训业的航空母舰。

sentences.english: The Chinese navy's first aircraft carrier has begun its sea trials, the state-run Xinhua news agency has said.
sentences.chinese: 中国新华社称，中国海军首艘航空母舰已经开始试航。

sentences.english: It is the second of the carriers due to enter into service by 2020.
sentences.chinese: 这是第二艘订服役到2020年的航空母舰。

sentences.english: Chinese aircraft carrier, the Liaoning, has anchored for the first time in its military port in Qingdao.
sentences.chinese: 中国航空母舰辽宁舰首次靠泊青岛某军港。

sentences.english: The carrier is armed with nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 那艘航空母舰配备有核子武器。

sentences.english: The South China Sea is a relatively small area for three carrier battle groups.
sentences.chinese: 要容下三艘航空母舰，南海的空间相对偏小。

sentences.english: This is the second section about damage effectiveness analysis of aircraft carrier under the attacking of submunition.
sentences.chinese: 这是子母弹对航空母舰毁伤效果分析的第二部分。

sentences.english: Jimmy Doolittle told his crews where they were going only after the carrier was at sea.
sentences.chinese: 吉米在航空母舰开进大海后才告诉乘务员们要去哪里。

sentences.english: The aerobus is direct to land a match field, model most bad also get aircraft carrier class.
sentences.chinese: 客机直接降落赛场，机型最差也得航空母舰级。

sentences.english: Having 11 aircraft carriers makes the United States "a real world power", he said.
sentences.chinese: 正是11艘航空母舰让美国成为世界霸权。

sentences.english: Why aircraft carrios crews need to be paid so much?
sentences.chinese: 为什么航空母舰船员需要多多给钱？

sentences.english: No wonder those countries welcome American aircraft-carriers.
sentences.chinese: 所以那些国家欢迎美国的航空母舰，也就不足为怪了。

sentences.english: Harrier jump-jet hovers above an aircraft carrier deck.
sentences.chinese: 一架鹰式喷射机在航空母舰上方盘旋。

sentences.english: Officials say the body was buried at sea from a Navy ship.
sentences.chinese: 有关官员称，尸体已动用航空母舰进行海葬。

sentences.english: This article is the third section to analysis effectiveness of the damage submunition against aircraft carrier.
sentences.chinese: 是子母弹对航空母舰毁伤效果分析的第三部分。

definition: aircraft carrier/abbr. for 航空母艦|航空母舰[hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4]

pinyin: he2 dong4 li4 hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4

definition: Liaoning, the first aircraft carrier commissioned into the PLA Navy (commissioned in 2012)

pinyin: gong1 ji1 xing2 he2 qian2 ting3
